title: Note values (0-87) are wrong. No way to "rest" in the music.
body:
Two issues:

1. A value of 0 is intended to silence a channel (like a "rest" in sheet music), but since 0 is being used as the end-of-data marker, this actually doesn't work.

2. The note table is 0-87, but you can't use 0 because of #1.

title: No support for the noise channel.
body: The code currently treats all four channels the same (piano notes 0-87), which is not how channel 3 (noise) works. The noise channel will have to have it's own function or values to take advantage of it.
